DOC.brief_summary: This study design assess efficacy safety combination therapy PAXIL benzodiazepine anxiolytic . PAXIL Tablet administer patient depression depressive episode receive Benzodiazepines least 4 week , change symptoms depression evaluate use rate extent decrease Hamilton Rating Scale Depression ( HAM-D ) .
DOC.brief_title: Combination Of PAXIL Tablet And Benzodiazepines
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients depression depressive episode diagnose major depressive disorder accord DSMIV criterion . Patients 14 high point total score Items No.1 17 HAMD . Patients continuously receive Benzodiazepine anxiolytic . Exclusion criterion : Patients strong suicide tendency .
